text: (mandayat) ovun (tama nivesvalin) pitamam karanu lÃ¦buvahot movun ovun samaga pitamam vi noyanu labannaha. ovunta viruddhava (kavurun ho) yuddha kalahot ovunta udav kirimata movun (idiriyata) noennaha. ovunta movun udav kirimata (idiripat) vuvada, niyata vasayenma pitupasa harava duvannaha. pasuva (kisivekut) ovunta kisima udavvak karanu nolabannaha
